DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : ECONOMY
DOC.TEXT: Panel Predicts Strong Economic Growth in ' 95 : The 17-member panel of executives , academics and other labor_market experts is forecasting that the nation ' s strong economic_growth will continue next year and that U.S. unemployment will remain at about 5.6 % . The Human Resources Forecast group -- sponsored by UCLA ' s graduate_school of management and headed by New York labor economist Audrey Freedman -- said the recovery of America ' s trading partners is extending the nation ' s business expansion . At the same time , the panel found that the growing wage gap in the U.S. economy is " sapping the American sense of well-being. "
